DOC.brief_summary: The study shall prove whether 6 consecutive dos Bifonazole spray show comparable efficacy Terbinafine solution apply .
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Safety Efficacy Study New Bifonazol Spray v Terbinafine Solution v Placebo
DOC.criteria: Male female subject age 18 70 year Positive clinical finding athlete 's foot , limited interdigital space , total athlete 's foot severity score ( AFSS ) least 5 exceed 10 point sign symptoms athlete 's foot , sign symptom score 'severe ' Clinical history suggestive intolerance allergy one product ingredients product Plantar tinea pedis ( `` Mocassintype '' ) Onychomycosis toe Previous treatment systemic antifungal within 6 month prior screen Previous treatment foot topical antifungal within 4 week prior screen Previous treatment topical antifungal apply area body foot within 2 week prior screen Previous treatment topical medication apply foot within 2 week prior screen
